--- layout: apidoc title: Tile5 API Documentation ---

T5.DrawLayer

extends: T5.ViewLayer

The DrawLayer is a generic layer that handles drawing, hit testing and syncing a list of drawables. A T5.DrawLayer itself is never meant to be implemented as it has no internal T5.Drawable storage, but rather relies on descendants to implement storage and provide the drawables by the loadDrawables method.

Methods

find(selector: String)

The find method will eventually support retrieving all the shapes from the shape layer that match the selector expression. For now though, it just returns all shapes

hitGuess(hitX, hitY, state, view)

Return true if any of the markers are hit, additionally, store the hit elements so we don't have to do the work again when drawing

add(poly)

Used to add a T5.Poly to the layer
